title: Tarot Card of the Day Free!
creator: CMZ2

extendedInfo.description: Tarot card of the day is a daily card reading done by a person not a computer. Using the Rider Waite tarot deck one card a day, from 0-77 (one cycle), until the card deck is finished. The reading is meant for guidance using the message of the card of the day for those who seek advice, motivation, inspiration, or are simply curios. Card of the Day is updated daily at midnight US Pacific time.* Beautiful high quality Card images optimized for mobile *Browser-like navigation*Social network links*Faster Navigation*Straight to the point*No Log In or Registration*Move app from SD card to Device
